column.h1: Netbeans RCP Training at Bielefeld University
column.p: Geertjan Wielenga and Aljoscha Rittner recently gave a great three day introductory course on core Netbeans RCP technologies to a group of twenty people at Bielefeld University. During the course, Geertjan asked for presentations of existing applications based on Netbeans RCP, and here it is.
